title: What level is required for urf?
body:
Just as the title says. Got a friend to join and so far is level 6. It's probably obvious but can't find it. Would like to know what the level requirement is. 

Thanks for the help.

replies.body:
Last I knew it's a minimum of level 10 to play featured game modes. In fact, last I checked, it will actually tell you if you're not eligible to play what level is required when you click on it in the "play" section.

EDIT: In fact it **does** tell you the minimum level requirement when you mouse over if you aren't eligible to play it. (see attached screenshot)
I'm pretty sure it would be around 10, cause i and my mate who is level like 12 or something
Not 100% sure but I believe it's either level 10 or 15.
